name: Pasqually's Pizza & Wings
address: Parking lot, 6339 200 St, Langley, BC V2Y 1A2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza Duo Bundle
hasMenuItem.description:
Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter.
Feeds 4-6

hasMenuItem.name: All-Meat Large 14” Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, pepperoni, sausage, ham, beef, bacon and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter

hasMenuItem.name: Boneless Wings
hasMenuItem.description:
Choose size based on weight from: 8 oz, 16 oz or 24 oz (each lb yields 14-19 pieces)

Plain or choice of sauce:  Louisiana Honey Hot sauce , Spicy Korean BBQ sauce, Homestyle BBQ sauce, Sweet Thai Chili sauce, Buffalo BBQ sauce, or Spicy Buffalo sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Supreme Large 14" Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, pepperoni, sausage, beef, black olives, mushrooms, red onions and green peppers and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter

hasMenuItem.name: Pasqually's Large 14" Cheese Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza & Boneless Wings Combo
hasMenuItem.description:
Includes 1 Large 14" , 1 Topping Pizza and 2 orders of Boneless Wings
Feeds 2-3

hasMenuItem.name: Pasqually's Large CYO 14" Pizza (Includes 1 - topping)
hasMenuItem.description: Create your own - our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter. You can choose your toppings- add as many as you like!

hasMenuItem.name: Saucy Meatballs
hasMenuItem.description: A marriage of all-beef meatballs & flavorful sauce. Choose from 3 flavor explosions: Sweet Thai Chili sauce, Spicy Korean BBQ sauce or our new Buffalo BBQ sauce.  Each served with an additional side of sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Meatball Dunkers
hasMenuItem.description: A bite of an all-beef meatball wrapped in our house-made dough with a touch of marinara sauce, a pinch of mozzarella and baked ‘til golden brown, brushed with garlic butter and served with a choice of sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Brownie
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of two rich cocoas & chocolate chips.  An indulgent serving that 2-3 can share

hasMenuItem.name: NEW Shareable Cheesy Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Our house-made dough brushed with garlic butter and layer on mozzarella & cheddar cheese, and we sprinkle it with our Italian seasoning and served with your choice of sauce.  (Sauce options: Marinara or Ranch)

hasMenuItem.name: Garden Salad
hasMenuItem.description: A colorful blend of Romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and your choice of dressing. Dressing served on the side

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza Duo Bundle
hasMenuItem.description:
Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter.
Feeds 4-6

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza & Boneless Wings Combo
hasMenuItem.description:
Includes 1 Large 14" , 1 Topping Pizza and 2 orders of Boneless Wings
Feeds 2-3

hasMenuItem.name: Pizza & Traditional Wings Combo
hasMenuItem.description:
Includes 1 Large 14" , 1 Topping Pizza and 1 order of Traditional Wings
Feeds 2-3

hasMenuItem.name: Party Pizza
hasMenuItem.description:
Pizza Party- All Large 14" Signature Pizzas to include 1 Cheese, 1 Pepperoni 1 All-Veggie and 1 All- Meat

Choice of crust, no pizza substitutions but you may omit toppings under special instructions.
Feeds 10-15

hasMenuItem.name: Grand Pizza Party
hasMenuItem.description:
Grand Pizza Party  includes all 14" Large Signature Pizzas to include 1 Cheese, 2 Pepperoni, 2 All- Veggie and 2 All-Meat

Choice of crust, no pizza substitutions but you may omit toppings under special instructions.
Feeds 18-22

hasMenuItem.name: Crowd Pleaser
hasMenuItem.description:
2 Large 1 topping Pizzas, choice of 1 large Specialty from our Faves & 2 Dunkers with your choice of sauce.
Feeds 8-10

hasMenuItem.name: Double Duo
hasMenuItem.description:
2 Large 1 topping Pizzas, 1 Meatball Dunkers, Choice of 1 Saucy Meatballs & 4 Beverages.
Feeds 6-8

hasMenuItem.name: Homestyle BBQ Chicken with Buffalo & Ranch Drizzle
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with BBQ Sauce, shredded mozzarella & cheddar cheeses, chicken, red onions, green peppers and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter. Once baked we finish it off with a Drizzle of Buffalo & Ranch

hasMenuItem.name: CYO Pizza with Choice of Drizzle Duo
hasMenuItem.description: Create your own - our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella & cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter. Includes choice of a Double Drizzle and you can choose your toppings- add as many as you like!

hasMenuItem.name: Flavor Up- Spicy Hawaiian drizzled with BBQ sauce Large 14" Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with Sweet Thai Chili sauce, shredded mozzarella & cheddar cheeses, topped with ham, pineapple, jalapenos and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter and topped with a drizzle of BBQ sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie with BBQ & Buffalo Drizzle
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella & cheddar cheeses, black olives, mushrooms, red onions, green peppers and tomatoes and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter. Once baked we finish it off with a Drizzle of BBQ & Buffalo sauce

hasMenuItem.name: All-Meat Large 14” Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, pepperoni, sausage, ham, beef, bacon and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter

hasMenuItem.name: Supreme Large 14" Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, pepperoni, sausage, beef, black olives, mushrooms, red onions and green peppers and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter

hasMenuItem.name: Homestyle BBQ Chicken Large 14" Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with BBQ Sauce, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, chicken, red onions, green peppers and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter

hasMenuItem.name: All-Veggie Large 14” Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses, black olives, mushrooms, red onions, green peppers and tomatoes and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Hawaiian Large 14" Specialty Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with Sweet Thai Chili sauce, shredded mozzarella & cheddar cheeses, topped with ham, pineapple, jalapenos and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Signature Meatball Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella, all-beef meatballs, fresh spinach, and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Pasqually's Large 14" Cheese Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter.

hasMenuItem.name: Pasqually's Large CYO 14" Pizza (Includes 1 - topping)
hasMenuItem.description: Create your own - our signature 14" pizza starts with house-made dough topped with marinara, shredded mozzarella and cheddar cheeses and a blend of Italian seasonings, which is then baked to order and brushed with garlic butter. You can choose your toppings- add as many as you like!

hasMenuItem.name: Boneless Wings
hasMenuItem.description:
Choose size based on weight from: 8 oz, 16 oz or 24 oz (each lb yields 14-19 pieces)

Plain or choice of sauce:  Louisiana Honey Hot sauce , Spicy Korean BBQ sauce, Homestyle BBQ sauce, Sweet Thai Chili sauce, Buffalo BBQ sauce, or Spicy Buffalo sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Add a half pound of French Fries with your choice of seasoning: Salted, Salted Lime Chili or Lemmon Pepper. Each order includes a side of ketchup

hasMenuItem.name: Signature Sauce Duo Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature sauce duo's include a choice of  traditional or boneless wings and served with Ranch or Blue Cheese on the side for dipping

hasMenuItem.name: Traditional Wings
hasMenuItem.description:
Choose size based on weight from: 12 oz, 24 oz or 36 oz (each lb yields 9-11 pieces). 

Plain, sauced or rubbed. Choose between Louisiana Honey Hot sauce , Spicy Korean BBQ sauce, Homestyle BBQ sauce, Sweet Thai Chili sauce, Buffalo BBQ sauce, or Spicy Buffalo sauce. Or try one of our dry rubs: Lemon Pepper or Chili Lime

hasMenuItem.name: Flavor Up Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Our new curated sauce blends sure to please your tastebuds. Choice of traditional or boneless wings and served with Ranch or Blue Cheese on the side for dipping

hasMenuItem.name: Meatball Dunkers
hasMenuItem.description: A bite of an all-beef meatball wrapped in our house-made dough with a touch of marinara sauce, a pinch of mozzarella and baked ‘til golden brown, brushed with garlic butter and served with a choice of sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Saucy Meatballs
hasMenuItem.description: A marriage of all-beef meatballs & flavorful sauce. Choose from 3 flavor explosions: Sweet Thai Chili sauce, Spicy Korean BBQ sauce or our new Buffalo BBQ sauce.  Each served with an additional side of sauce

hasMenuItem.name: NEW Shareable Cheesy Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Our house-made dough brushed with garlic butter and layer on mozzarella & cheddar cheese, and we sprinkle it with our Italian seasoning and served with your choice of sauce.  (Sauce options: Marinara or Ranch)

hasMenuItem.name: NEW Premium Shareable Cheesy Bread
hasMenuItem.description: Our house-made dough brushed with garlic butter and layer on mozzarella & cheddar cheese, and we sprinkle it with our Italian seasoning and served with your choice of sauce. Try our favorite topped with spinach & bacon or build your own – each topping just $.99

hasMenuItem.name: Garden Salad
hasMenuItem.description: A colorful blend of Romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and your choice of dressing. Dressing served on the side

hasMenuItem.name: Brownie
hasMenuItem.description: A blend of two rich cocoas & chocolate chips.  An indulgent serving that 2-3 can share

hasMenuItem.name: Choice of Pepsi-Cola®
hasMenuItem.description: Choice of a Pepsi-Cola® soft drink, each a 12 oz can

review.reviewBody: Homestyle BBQ chicken was the best I've ever had!
